paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on variants in the KCNH2 gene, including penetrance data and individual records.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: We found one novel variant in KCNH2 (c.202T>A, p.F68I), which encodes one of the alpha-subunit of the potassium channel and regulates the final repolarization of the cardiac action potential.

functional_data.summary: The variant is located at the Per-Arnt-Sim (PAS) domain of the N-terminus cytosolic region of KCNH2, and mutation on the PAS domain has been suggested to alter the channel activity.

variants.additional_notes: The variant is suggested to have a significant impact on the function of the KCNH2 channel.
key_quotes: This variant is located at the Per-Arnt-Sim (PAS) domain of the N-terminus cytosolic region of KCNH2, and mutation on the PAS domain has been suggested to alter the channel activity.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data for the KCNH2 variant was extracted successfully.
